title: Minister Ramtane Lamamra on working visit to Rwanda
text: The Minister of Foreign Affairs and National Community Abroad, Ramtane Lamamra undertook a working visit to the Republic of Rwanda on Saturday, as a special envoy of the President of the Republic.
The Algerian FM had previously held talks with his Rwandan counterpart, Vincent Biruta, during which the two ministers exchanged views on the upcoming bilateral and multilateral events.

In addition, Lamamra, accompanied by Algeriaâ€™s Ambassador to Rwanda, Merzak Bedjaoui, visited the headquarters of the new resident embassy of Algeria in Kigali, whose recent opening is part of the implementation of the instructions of the President of the Republic to strengthen the ties of solidarity and cooperation with this friendly country.
Lamamra will be received in audience by the President of the Republic of Rwanda, Paul Kagame to give him a written message from his brother President Abdelmadjid Tebboune.
